definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The latex will make the fabric waterproof, but be mindful that latex sticks to latex.
sentences.chinese: 膠乳會讓布片防水，但注意它們可能會互相黏住。

sentences.english: Set standards and stick to them.
sentences.chinese: 設定標準而且黏住他們。

sentences.english: It traps dirt and other matter and keeps insects out.
sentences.chinese: 它黏住髒東西，防止昆蟲進入。

sentences.english: Under the ends, there are pieces of thick double-sided tape to give it a "springy" feel.
sentences.chinese: 在兩邊的尾端，用泡棉膠黏住，讓它有點彈性。

sentences.english: Or stick a stick across a cross.
sentences.chinese: 或黏住一根棍，越過十字架。

sentences.english: During the Vietnam War, super glue was used to seal minor wounds.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭期間，強力膠曾被用來黏住細小傷口。

definition: to draw (towards)/to be drawn to/to be sucked in
to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to adhere/to stick together/to bond/to agglutinate/adhesion/adhesive
to hook onto/to hitch onto/to catch onto
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
to jam/to choke/to clutch/also pr. [qia3 zhu4]
